availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Magoffin County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Phoebe Arnett. Father of Cambridge C. Salyer, William Salyer, Elizabeth Salyer, Stephen A. Salyer, Abigail Salyer, Malinda Salyer, Samuel Salyer, David Salyer, John B. Salyer, and Amanda Salyer. Farmer in Floyd County in 1850. Farmer in Magoffin County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Floyd County, My District, p. 446B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Magoffin County, Licking Station, p. 1.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, Grassy, p. 354B.
